title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Clean open-source web UI for chatting with any Ollama model; features folders, prompts, code highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat sidebar.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Feature-rich TUI for Ollama written in Go; browse, pull, chat, manage models from the terminal.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, custom options.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API; supports chat, completions, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; chat, completions, embeddings with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models privately.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for LLM-based testing.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop app built with Tauri + React for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of community-contributed Modelfile recipes for Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that proxies and caches Ollama endpoints for web apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client for Ollama using reqwest; chat, embeddings, model ops with serde types.
